_AdaptiveAuthorizationMode_.description: This is meta for current::modeId qualified variable value.

brief.description: This is a predicate for this modeId value with the first letter capitalized and without a trailing period.
brief.title: Brief

modeId.description: This is used to uniquely identify this particular authorization mode.
modeId.title: Mode Id
